refnamediv.refpurpose: Automation class supporting selection and clipboard.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: AgsAutomation acts as a container of AgsAcceleration.

entry.para: if TRUE add to selection, else to default automation

refsect2.title: ags_automation_find_point ()
refsect2.programlisting: AgsAcceleration * ags_automation_find_point (AgsAutomation *automation, guint x, guint y, gboolean use_selection_list);
refsect2.para: Find acceleration by offset and acceleration.

refsect2.title: ags_automation_find_region ()
refsect2.programlisting: GList * ags_automation_find_region (AgsAutomation *automation, guint x0, guint y0, guint x1, guint y1, gboolean use_selection_list);
refsect2.para: Find acceleration by offset and tone region.

refsect2.title: ags_automation_add_point_to_selection ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_automation_add_point_to_selection (AgsAutomation *automation, guint x, guint y, gboolean replace_current_selection);

refsect2.title: ags_automation_remove_point_from_selection ()
refsect2.para: Remove acceleration at position of selection.

refsect2.title: ags_automation_add_region_to_selection ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_automation_add_region_to_selection (AgsAutomation *automation, guint x0, guint y0, guint x1, guint y1, gboolean replace_current_selection);

refsect2.title: ags_automation_remove_region_from_selection ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_automation_remove_region_from_selection (AgsAutomation *automation, guint x0, guint y0, guint x1, guint y1);
refsect2.para: Remove acceleration within region of selection.

refsect2.title: ags_automation_insert_from_clipboard ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_automation_insert_from_clipboard (AgsAutomation *automation, xmlNodePtr content, gboolean reset_x_offset, guint x_offset, gboolean reset_y_offset, guint y_offset);

refsect2.title: ags_automation_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: AgsAutomation * ags_automation_new (GObject *audio, guint line, GType channel_type, gchar *control_name);
